question: Which fruit can hurt your eyes if you peel it holding your face too close to it? Choices: banana, pear, orange, mango
generated_rationale: The fruit that can hurt your eyes if you peel it holding your face too close to it is the banana. The other fruits, such as pear, orange, and mango, do not contain this chemical and are not likely to cause any harm when peeled and held close to the eyes.
